- BPIV_BTCH_ID & - & BPIV_BTCP_LINENO & - & BPIV_BTPC_LINENO & - &
- BPIV_LINENO

- INVOICE_BUYING_HISTORY row will be stored now
27.01.2003 SH SCR2879 Add new fields to BPH254M DCMO including logic
- DCMO_BALANCE, DCMO_NINVOICEOUTSTANDING, DCMO_BALANCELO
27.01.2003 SH SCR2786 Changes in BPH254M/N/O -> Enlarged some test with
- MARK_CODE_DISPUTES for INVO_MARKCODETEXT and added two add calls

23.01.2002 SH Changes according to new specs, only remarks and task titles were
- changed
15.01.2002 RR/SH Fixed some bugs in BPH254O and BPH254Q
14.01.2003 RR/SH SCR2146 BPH254Q Moved virtual which needed for the recompute
- above the LinkQuery
18.12.2002 SH BPH254E Enlarged CND for updating INVO_DUNNINGSTOP
1. BPH254A Set TMPL_DESCRIPTION = 'batch'&BTCH_ID&'_'&BTCP_LINENO if
BPIV_VARIABLETEXT = ''
2. BPH254B1/BPH254B2/BPH254E DEBB_LASTRECVPAYBANKACCOUNT
and DEBB_LASTRECVPAYBANKID only updated if BTCP_BTCH_BATCHCODE =
GNRL_BATCHIDPAYMENTS
3. BPH254C Call BID018 to calculate the INVO_AUTOMATICINCASSO and BID015
to store Invoice dunning rows
4. BPH254E Call BID015 to store Invoice dunning rows for the new invoice
5. BPH254E Changed storing of INVA_ACTAFACTORING and INVA_ACTASPECIAL
for Heller- and Invoice-Currency

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(INVA_ACTASPECIAL) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(INVA_ACTAFACTORING) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/INVA join :1/INVO on INVO_ADMNO = :3 and INVO_CLNTNO = :4 and INVO_AACTUALI < 0 and INVO_PAYMENTCODE > 0 and INVO_NO = INVA_NO join :1/PAYC on PAYC_CODE = INVO_PAYMENTCODE and PAYC_SKIPSUSPENDED = 'N' where INVA_CURRENCY = ':2' for fetch only
